channel.title: Solitude - Revolutionary Open-Sourced PI Official Release
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/wwkrqg.png[/img]
317 Server 317/474/602/whogivesafuck Cache Economy-based server Public Spawn Server OPTIONAL (Config.java)
[B]Server + Client Download:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?w8q3wlwojdwwrrt]Solitude Final by LunarKnight.zip[/url] 8.15 MB Updated 7-21-2012 The Cache is automatically downloaded in the client, but here's the link anyway: [B]Cache Download:[/B] [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/50348183/SolitudeCache.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/50348183/SolitudeCache.zip[/url]
I'm releasing this because I don't want to waste my time working on RSPS again. Original Source: InsidiaX (Very bad don't use it)
I'm not going to post a ton features, but I'll post enough. Don't hate on it if you haven't checked the entire server out, you're just being an ignorant asshole if you do that shit. If you want to start a new server that's ready to host with tons of fixes, stability and features this is what you should use.
[B]Features:[/B] - 25 Skills (Disabled PKing skill because I was going to add Construction but decided not to) - Lots of stuff, it would take me an hour to list half so fuck that. It's a great server, play it and look for yourself. [B]Here's some pictures instead.[/B] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/20j62pd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/6gyicw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/344pj61.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/zoerrn.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2znx0xy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/s4q87t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/35ajiwl.jpg[/img] I was going to add normal Altar/Talisman-styled RC but it's time to release. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/xf2mhd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/ke9c28.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/wgq7ol.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/i5yzxw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/z48w9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/bgcytj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/an1p2d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2s6m0rq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/oizo95.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/25uhaaa.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1415koy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2prtpa1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/14jyb9u.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2sbmosz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/5ocymh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/k2ocpl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/zvvbxy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/ne80th.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/33ykumr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/14jooxj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/9zppjr.jpg[/img] [url=http://i41.tinypic.com/11bj9zk.jpg]http://i41.tinypic.com/11bj9zk.jpg[/url] More Pics: (30 image limit) [url=http://i40.tinypic.com/z4riw.jpg]http://i40.tinypic.com/z4riw.jpg[/url] [url=http://i43.tinypic.com/20ij8fq.jpg]http://i43.tinypic.com/20ij8fq.jpg[/url] [url=http://i43.tinypic.com/34qu6wo.jpg]http://i43.tinypic.com/34qu6wo.jpg[/url] [url=http://i40.tinypic.com/2hi8ewy.jpg]http://i40.tinypic.com/2hi8ewy.jpg[/url] [url=http://i43.tinypic.com/347wq6r.jpg]http://i43.tinypic.com/347wq6r.jpg[/url] [url=http://i41.tinypic.com/2r6p4jl.jpg]http://i41.tinypic.com/2r6p4jl.jpg[/url] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/250781d.jpg[/img]
Alright, that's a fraction of the new features. Inb4 kids think that's all there is to it. I'm not going to waste more time on this post because it's all going to be leeched anyway. Have a good day everyone!
I wouldn't mind a little rep/thanks though.
For the full experience and features, try playing the game. [/CENTER]

I used this source for my server, over 2 years ago. Built on it a lot, bet you’d like to see what I’ve done with it If you’re curious, Here’s my site, with link to webclient / dl client. Thanks for Solitude, buddy.

item.description:
@jeake wrote:

I did a couple things then all the sudden when i run i get this

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:65)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:504)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527)
at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:319)
at server.world.ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:35)
at server.Server.(Server.java:65)
Press any key to continue . . .

what do i do?

item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

DevinCooley:

I am also having a problem with the chat. Every time a player longs into the server and try to talk the freeze and have to reload client. The only way a player does not glitch out when they try to talk is when they are admin or owner. Otherwise no one can talk on my server which completely ruins the point. If anyone could help i would be stoked out of my mind. Because this source is awesome and I dont feel like getting comftorable working with a new one.

That happens to me for my webclient for some reason nobody can talk on it , but downloadable client works fine
